title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
OB: When connecting to a Derby database, the column icons do not appear.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and select Derby as the database type. 
4. Provide the following details for the Derby connection:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
5. Once the Data Source is set up, create a new dataset. 
6. In the Edit Dataset window, select the Query option.
